dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A major drug bust in Pavlodar has just concluded with some pretty heavy sentences.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A major drug bust in Pavlodar has just concluded with some pretty heavy sentences.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Three foreign nationals have been sentenced to lengthy prison terms in Pavlodar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, three foreign nationals, right? And one Kazakh citizen. The court just handed down their verdict.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, three foreign nationals, right? And one Kazakh citizen. The court just handed down their verdict.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Specialized Interdistrict Criminal Court of Pavlodar Region delivered a verdict against four members of a transnational criminal group, including two 46-year-old citizens of Moldova. The court also found a 31-year-old Russian citizen and a Kazakh of the same age guilty of involvement in the criminal group.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Two of them were from Moldova, both 46 years old. They set up a drug lab and produced over 120 kilograms of mephedrone in just a month.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Two of them were from Moldova, both forty six years old. They set up a drug lab and produced over one hundred twenty kilograms of mephedrone in just a month.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Specialized Interdistrict Criminal Court of Pavlodar Region delivered a verdict against four members of a transnational criminal group, including two 46-year-old citizens of Moldova. They had organized a drug lab and, within a month, produced over 120 kilograms of mephedrone worth billions of tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Billions of tenge worth, that's insane. And they weren't alone—there was a Russian and a Kazakh national involved, both 31.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Billions of tenge worth, that's insane. And they weren't alone-there was a Russian and a Kazakh national involved, both thirty one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They had organized a drug lab and, within a month, produced over 120 kilograms of mephedrone worth billions of tenge. The court also found a 31-year-old Russian citizen and a Kazakh of the same age guilty of involvement in the criminal group.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: What's wild is their background—childhood friends from Stepnogorsk, and both graduates of prestigious foreign universities. One was a software engineer, the other a teacher.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What's wild is their background-childhood friends from Stepnogorsk, and both graduates of prestigious foreign universities. One was a software engineer, the other a teacher.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to court proceedings, the childhood friends had come to Pavlodar from Stepnogorsk in January of the previous year. Both were graduates of prestigious foreign universities—one a software engineer, the other a teacher.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they said they came to Pavlodar for a courier job paying $3,000 a month. They claimed they had no idea what was in the boxes they were delivering.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they said they came to Pavlodar for a courier job paying three thousand dollars a month. They claimed they had no idea what was in the boxes they were delivering.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I saw an ad for a courier job offering $3,000 a month. I suggested it to my friend—he was also unemployed. We arrived in Pavlodar, bought various goods, delivered boxes and canisters—we didn't question what was inside, one of the defendants told the court.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But the Moldovans had a different story—they said they were tricked into coming to work at a tobacco factory, but ended up in a private house with a drug lab in the yard.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the Moldovans had a different story-they said they were tricked into coming to work at a tobacco factory, but ended up in a private house with a drug lab in the yard.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Moldovan citizens claimed they were lured to Kazakhstan under the pretense of working at a tobacco factory. They told us we'd be working at a tobacco plant. But when we got there, we ended up in a private house with a workshop in the yard.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They even said they were held like slaves—constantly watched, threatened, told they'd be buried in the steppe if they tried to escape.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They even said they were held like slaves-constantly watched, threatened, told they'd be buried in the steppe if they tried to escape.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We were held like slaves—there was always a car parked outside, we were watched, threatened, told if we tried to escape, we'd be found and buried in the steppe, said one of the foreign defendants.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The court didn't buy it though. Judge Nurlan Aitbayev stated they knowingly came to commit crimes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The court didn't buy it though. Judge Nurlan Aitbayev stated they knowingly came to commit crimes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The court viewed these claims as an attempt to mitigate their punishment. The foreign nationals knowingly entered Kazakhstan to engage in criminal activity, stated Judge Nurlan Aitbayev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So the sentences were harsh—15 years for the Kazakh and the Russian, but 18 years for the Moldovans, plus confiscation of property.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So the sentences were harshminus fifteen years for the Kazakh and the Russian, but eighteen years for the Moldovans, plus confiscation of property.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Kazakh and Russian nationals were each sentenced to 15 years in a correctional facility, while the two Moldovan citizens received 18 years with confiscation of property.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Their lawyers tried arguing they weren't acquainted and acted independently, but the court wasn't having it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Their lawyers tried arguing they weren't acquainted and acted independently, but the court wasn't having it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The defense lawyers had requested reduced sentences, arguing the defendants were not acquainted and acted independently. The court found no grounds for leniency, as the defendants committed serious and especially grave crimes that pose a significant threat to public safety.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: No leniency for crimes this serious. They're all heading to a medium-security prison now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No leniency for crimes this serious. They're all heading to a medium-security prison now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The court found no grounds for leniency, as the defendants committed serious and especially grave crimes that pose a significant threat to public safety. All convicts will serve their terms in a medium-security prison.
